attributes.action: Include the innishargy road kircubbin on the road gritting scheme
attributes.background:
Main through route used by commuters linking both sides of the ards peninsula between kircubbin and ballywalter 
Used by school busses 
Large goods vehicles 
One of the most dangerous roads in the area in frosty mornings 
Large number of accidents each year

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/services/online-register-local-councillors
